title: Dark elven short sword (SLASH'EM)
data:
- - *For the weapon in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), see [droven short sword](/wiki/Droven_short_sword "Droven short sword").*
  - *For the weapon in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), see [dark elven short sword (EvilHack)](/wiki/Dark_elven_short_sword_\(EvilHack\) "Dark elven short sword (EvilHack)").*

| ) [![Dark elven short sword.png](/images/d/d0/Dark_elven_short_sword.png)](/wiki/File:Dark_elven_short_sword.png) |                                                         |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name                                                                                                              | dark elven short sword                                  |
| Appearance                                                                                                        | black runed short sword                                 |
| Damage vs. small                                                                                                  | 1d8                                                     |
| Damage vs. large                                                                                                  | 1d8                                                     |
| To-hit bonus                                                                                                      | +0                                                      |
| Weapon skill                                                                                                      | [short sword](/wiki/Short_sword "Short sword")          |
| Size                                                                                                              | [one-handed](/wiki/One-handed "One-handed")             |
| Base price                                                                                                        | 10 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid") (+10/positive enchant) |
| Weight                                                                                                            | [30](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                             |
| Material                                                                                                          | [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood")                               |

A **dark elven short sword** is a type of [weapon](/wiki/Weapon "Weapon") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). It is a one-handed melee weapon that uses the [short sword](/wiki/Short_sword "Short sword") [skill](/wiki/Skill "Skill"). It is made of [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood"), and appears as a **black runed short sword** when [unidentified](/wiki/Identification "Identification").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)

  - [1.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [1.2 SpliceHack](#SpliceHack)
  - [1.3 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)

- [2 Description](#Description)

## Generation

[Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven short sword. Drow [Rogues](/wiki/Rogue "Rogue") start with a dark elven short sword in place of their role's standard short sword.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

Drow in [SLASH'EM, SlashTHEM](/wiki/Drow_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Drow (SLASH'EM)") [and SpliceHack](/wiki/Drow_\(SpliceHack\) "Drow (SpliceHack)") [always generate with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") a dark elven bow and 3-14 dark elven arrows.[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

### SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, dark elven short swords are not randomly generated. [Upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") a [dwarvish short sword](/wiki/Dwarvish_short_sword "Dwarvish short sword") has a 1⁄2 chance of producing a dark elven short sword.[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)

### SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, dark elven short swords are not randomly generated.

### SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, dark elven short swords can be randomly generated like other weapons, and general [stores](/wiki/Store "Store"), used armor dealerships and antique weapon outlets can sell dark elven short swords. Upgrading works the same as in SLASH'EM.

## Description

The dark elven short sword is nearly identical to the [elven short sword](/wiki/Elven_short_sword "Elven short sword") minus its appearance, with the same damage and [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") bonus.

Upgrading a dark elven short sword will produce a dwarvish short sword.[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Dark_elven_short_sword_\(SLASH%27EM\)\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [makemon.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 369](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/makemon.c#line369 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/makemon.c")

html:
Dark elven short sword (SLASH'EM)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
For the weapon in dNetHack and notdNetHack, see droven short sword.
For the weapon in EvilHack, see dark elven short sword (EvilHack).
)
Name dark elven short sword
Appearance black runed short sword
Damage vs. small 1d8
Damage vs. large 1d8
To-hit bonus +0
Weapon skill short sword
Size one-handed
Base price 10 zm
(+10/positive
enchant)
Weight 30
Material wood

A dark elven short sword is a type of weapon that appears in SLASH'EM, SpliceHack and SlashTHEM. It is a one-handed melee weapon that uses the short sword skill. It is made of wood, and appears as a black runed short sword when unidentified.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
    • 1.1 SLASH'EM
    • 1.2 SpliceHack
    • 1.3 SlashTHEM
  • 2 Description

Generation

Drow characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven short sword. Drow Rogues start with a dark elven short sword in place of their role's standard short sword.[1]

Drow in SLASH'EM, SlashTHEM and SpliceHack always generate with a dark elven bow and 3-14 dark elven arrows.[2]

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, dark elven short swords are not randomly generated. Upgrading a dwarvish short sword has a 1⁄2 chance of producing a dark elven short sword.[3]

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, dark elven short swords are not randomly generated.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, dark elven short swords can be randomly generated like other weapons, and general stores, used armor dealerships and antique weapon outlets can sell dark elven short swords. Upgrading works the same as in SLASH'EM.

Description

The dark elven short sword is nearly identical to the elven short sword minus its appearance, with the same damage and to-hit bonus.

Upgrading a dark elven short sword will produce a dwarvish short sword.[4]

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

  2. ↑ makemon.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 369
  3. ↑ potion.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 2199
  4. ↑ potion.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 2230

A '''dark elven short sword''' is a type of [[weapon]] that appears in [[SLASH'EM]], [[SpliceHack]] and [[SlashTHEM]]. It is a one-handed melee weapon that uses the [[short sword]] [[skill]]. It is made of [[wood]], and appears as a '''black runed short sword''' when [[identification|unidentified]].

==Generation==
[[Drow (starting race)|Drow]] characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven short sword. Drow [[Rogue]]s start with a dark elven short sword in place of their role's standard short sword.{{refsrc|makemon.c|357|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}}

Drow in [[Drow (SLASH'EM)|SLASH'EM, SlashTHEM]] [[Drow (SpliceHack)|and SpliceHack]] [[Monster starting inventory|always generate with]] a dark elven bow and 3-14 dark elven arrows.{{refsrc|makemon.c|369|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}}

===SLASH'EM===
In SLASH'EM, dark elven short swords are not randomly generated. [[Upgrading]] a [[dwarvish short sword]] has a {{frac|2}} chance of producing a dark elven short sword.{{refsrc|potion.c|2199|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}}

===SpliceHack===
In SpliceHack, dark elven short swords are not randomly generated.

===SlashTHEM===
In SlashTHEM, dark elven short swords can be randomly generated like other weapons, and general [[store]]s, used armor dealerships and antique weapon outlets can sell dark elven short swords. Upgrading works the same as in SLASH'EM.

==Description==
The dark elven short sword is nearly identical to the [[elven short sword]] minus its appearance, with the same damage and [[to-hit]] bonus.

Upgrading a dark elven short sword will produce a dwarvish short sword.{{refsrc|potion.c|2230|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}}
